COVID-19 Is the Chinese Government’s Curse upon the World

https://www.nationalreview.com/2020/03/covid-19-is-the-chinese-governments-curse-upon-the-world/

在以上这篇文章中，已经有美国的主流造词了，叫ChiCom Flu。在文中最后还提到ChiComs才是问题。

ChiCom分解开来也就是Chinese Communists。 因此能被美国政界和民间主流接受的专业术语新词应该是 ChiCom Virus，而CCP Virus则不够直接了当也不够蔑视，蔑视感来自于Chi。

It’s important to stress that it’s not the Chinese people who are the problem. Just look at their success in Taiwan, Hong Kong, Singapore, or the United States. The ChiComs are the problem.
